## Project Details
- Type: Full-stack web application
- Backend: Node.js + Express + Socket.io
- Frontend: React + Vite
- Language: JavaScript (Arabic UI)
- Features: Real-time multiplayer game for couples with 1000 questions, challenges, localStorage persistence, exit functionality
